mapper.select: SELECT SELLERREQUEST.*, MEMBER.email,MEMBER.nickname FROM SELLERREQUEST JOIN MEMBER ON SELLERREQUEST.memberno = MEMBER.no WHERE SELLERREQUEST.state =1 ORDER BY no DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SELLERREQUEST WHERE state = 1;
SELECT m.email, m.nickname, s.* FROM SELLERREQUEST s LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON s.memberno = m.no WHERE s.memberno = #{no} AND state = 1
